title: Movie Maina
description: It is an web application that enables the user to search movies of his interest with Keywords. Also the user can go through movie discription

title: News Glance
description: It is an web application that enables the user to go through news at one glance.Also the user can go through the detailed news if interested

title: Mess feed Back System
description: website where users can log in and give their feedback on mess food. implemented a voting system on listed food items, and the food item with the most votes will be on top of the list. .
